original_text: and the sanctuary was filled with smoke from the glory of God and from his power, and no one could enter the sanctuary until the seven plagues of the seven angels were finished.
korean_text: 하나님의 영광과 능력으로 말미암아 성전에 연기가 가득 차매 일곱 천사의 일곱 재앙이 마치기까지는 성전에 능히 들어갈 자가 없더라

sentences.original_text: and the sanctuary was filled with smoke
from the glory of God and from his power
and no one could enter the sanctuary
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아무도 성소에 들어갈 수 없었다

sentences.original_text: until the seven plagues of the seven angels were finished
